features: 【Solar Powered, Rechargeable, Waterproof and Wire-Free】This solar security cameras wireless outdoor/indoor camera has a 9000mah battery built in to provide continuous power for wireless outside cameras with high conversion rate solar panels.The wifi security camera outdoor with IP66 waterproof can work in any weather.Since the WIFI cam is completely wireless,no power cords or network cable is needed, the installation is very simple,allowing install anywhere though the provided,bracket and screw.

【3MP 2K HD Color Night Vision, 360° Pan and Tilt Control】Outdoor security cameras with (2304 x 1296) resolution,ultra clear and smooth video quality.Home security camera built-in infrared sensor lights switch to night vision mode automatically.Two white lights bring a full-color night view.This cameras for home security support 355°horizontal and 90°vertical rotation,with more areas that can be covered. Protect your home in all-around.(*Only support 2.4GHz WiFi,you can share with multiple users)

【PIR Motion Detection with AI Analysis Recognition】This wireless outdoor camera with advanced smart AI motions detection, it can clear analysis and recognition person, vehicle, pet and package. The AI PIR sensor will be triggered in real time once the outdoor security cameras detect motion, at the same time, the notification will be pushed to your phone via the app. Check the status of pets, prevent packages from being stolen, and protect the safety of your family's property.

【Two-Way Audio & Smart Instant Multi-Siren】This outside cameras security wireless has a built-in microphone and speaker that supports real-time, two-way, audio calls. Three alarm modes: siren alert, spotlight alarm, and APP notification push. With the mobile App you can warn off thieves, screen visitors at your door or communicate directly with your family or friends. Siren, flashing white light or 2-way talk that both allow you drive away thieves and unwanted visitors.

【Cloud/SD & Private Free 3-Day Cycle Cloud Storage】The home security camera supports Micro SD card (up to 128GB, not included) and cloud storage. It provides free rolling 3-day cycled cloud storage that you can enjoy storage service without any subscription. And it provides a 30-day free trial of advanced features that include AI recognition, upgraded cloud memory, custom alert areas and etc, the advanced features starts at $2.99 per month after 30 days free trial.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extremely simple, yet super effective.
reviews.reviewText: To start, the installation was pleasantly easy with fairly simple instructions. The wi-fi pick-up on the device is pretty solid as well, so I haven't had it lose connection as of yet. The picture quality is pretty good for this price range, especially coupled with the night vision feature and the option to flash a white light while monitoring; I found that it can really clarify some things at night. This camera also includes a toggle-able burglary alarm sound that is fairly convincing albeit not as loud as it could be. The solar charging works extremely well if the panel is well-placed, and I have had zero issues with battery capacity, also having the option of easily dismounting the camera from the snap-on base make it easy to swap SD cards(which are optional) or unplug the device and charge in the house. The manual controls work great through the app and the range of motion and field of view are fantastic. All in all, this device is superb in functionality for the price range and no required subscription service, I would not mind getting more than a few of these for my home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the panning, clarity, ease - Recommended
reviews.reviewText: PROS -Easy to set upSolar poweredPanning abilityClear picturesAccurate notificationsFree or paid version of appCONSnone yetFirst, I like this above others because of the attached solar panel. You don't have to bring it inside to charge, or change the batteries like other models. I have the free version of the app it comes with and it works very well to see videos, save if wanted, and alert to activity. The video is clear all the way from my house to across the street. The sensor which alerts for people coming to the door seems to be well made, because I don't get false alarms, it is pretty accurate. The panning feature is something you can do from you phone from anywhere, and you can change where the camera is pointing and check out the area. Overall, I think this was a very good purchase. It serves as a deterrent and also gives me a feeling of safety whether I'm at home or out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This camera is very impressive for such a low price point. I was a little skeptical to buy this, but the reviews were great, so I decided I would make the purchase.I am really blown away by the picture quality. It is very clear even during a dark sky or a rainy day.The solar panel works great and the battery stays charged all the time. This was one of the reasons I made the purchase. My other two cameras need charging every few weeks and it is a hassle. This makes things very easy.Another feature I love is being able to adjust the camera to focus on particular things. I actually sit on the couch and follow my dog through the yard to make sure she goes the bathroom before going bed for the night. I also use it to watch our 3 year-old play in the backyard if I am busy on the phone or in the kitchen.Installation was simple and the app works great. The Wi-Fi is dependable and I have never had it disconnect.Overall, I am really pleased to find a camera that works well, has all these features, and is half the price of similar ones that I was considering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Fantastic Solar-Powered Motion-Detectable Security Camera for Complete Peace of Mind
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I recently had the pleasure of trying out the solar-powered motion-detectable security camera, and I must say, it has truly exceeded my expectations. With its impressive features, this camera offers unparalleled convenience, versatility, and security for indoor and outdoor use.One of the standout features of this camera is its solar-powered functionality. Equipped with a high-capacity 9000mAh battery and efficient solar panels, it is easy to harness the power of the sun to provide continuous operation. You also have the option of charging the camera.I purchased a smaller chargeable camera from the same company four months ago. I was very happy with its features. Since I added another camera, it was easy to add it to the app I’m already using for my first camera. Now I’m able to see crisp and clear video footage. With the addition of this camera, I now have the added feature of moving the camera's point of view with the app. I’m now able to monitor our surroundings with exceptional detail. What's more, the built-in infrared sensor seamlessly switches to night vision mode, providing vibrant full-color night vision. The camera's 360° pan and tilt control further enhance its coverage, ensuring that no blind spots are left unchecked. I've included a screenshot recording of my app screen. Ignore the poor quality showing of the clip. My app show a great visual and you are even able to zoom in.Thanks to its advanced smart AI motion detection capabilities, this camera takes security to the next level. Its AI-powered analysis and recognition can distinguish between people, vehicles, pets, and even packages. The real-time notification feature promptly alerts you via the app whenever motion is detected, keeping you informed and in control of your property's safety.The two-way audio functionality allows for real-time communication. Whether you want to screen visitors at your door, warn off intruders, or simply talk to your loved ones, this camera enables seamless, two-way audio calls. Additionally, the camera offers multiple alarm modes, including a siren alert, spotlight alarm, and app notification push, effectively deterring unwanted visitors.When it comes to storage, the camera offers multiple options. It supports micro SD cards up to 128GB (not included), allowing for local storage of video footage. Additionally, the camera provides free rolling 3-day cycled cloud storage, ensuring your recordings are securely stored without the need for any subscription fees.In conclusion, the solar-powered motion-detectable security camera is an outstanding addition to comprehensive security and convenience. Its impressive features, including solar power, HD color night vision, AI motion detection, two-way audio, and versatile storage options, make it a top contender in the market. This camera lets you enjoy peace of mind, knowing that your home and loved ones are always protected.
